Gamma | E-beam | X-ray

Dosimetry for Industrial Radiation Processing

23 Mar 2020 - Current information regarding GEX business operations during the COVID-19 emergency click here.

What We Offer

Dosimeter Products

Routine Use

Our proprietary B3 radiochromic film dosimeter is a superior product choice for most applications and offer a dose range from <1.0 kGy to >150 kGy. Also available: alanine pellets & tubes, and CTA film.

details

Dosimetry Systems

Complete solutions for B3, FWT, CTA, PMMA and Alanine

GEX offers complete dosimetry solutions for radiation processing applications involving gamma, electron beam and X-ray sources of ionizing radiation, with a dose range capability of <10 Gy to 300 kGy.

details

Calibration Services

Dosimeter Batch Calibration Services | GEX International Standards Laboratory

We offer formalized, complete turnkey dosimeter batch calibration services for a wide range of applications. GEX is an international standards laboratory accredited by NVLAP to ISO/IEC 17025:2005 for calibrations and dose measurements for ionizing radiation for high-dose dosimetry in the range 0.25 kGy to 100 kGy.

details

Radiation Indicators

Type 1 process chemical indicators

ideal for maintaining inventory and quality control, GEX Radiation Indicators are Type 1 process chemical indicators, and exhibit an obvious, visual color change when exposed to radiation.

details

About Us

GEX is the industry’s single source for all your dosimetry-related needs. You can expect the highest quality products and unsurpassed customer service.
